  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Female Reproductive Cycles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weibliche Reproduktive Schleifen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycles Reproducteurs Femelles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclos Reproductive Fêmeas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cicli Riproduttivi Femminili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θηλυκοί αναπαραγωγικοί κύκλοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclos Reproductivos Femeninos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the Ovarian and Uterine cycles in the female and the hormonal control of these cycles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reproductive cycles,female</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Ovarian und uterinen 
Schleifen in der Frau und die hormonale Steuerung dieser Schleifen 
zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre les cycles 
Ovariens et utérins dans la femelle et la commande hormonale de 
ces cycles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre os ciclos ovarian e 
uterine na fêmea e o controle hormonal destes ciclos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra i cicli ovarian ed 
uterini nella femmina ed il controllo ormonale di questi cicli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τους ωοθηκικούς και 
μητρικούς κύκλους στο θηλυκό και τον ορμονικό έλεγχο αυτών των 
κύκλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra los ciclos ováricos
y uterinos en la hembra y el control hormonal de estos ciclos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reproduktive Schleifen, Frau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cycles reproducteurs, femelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciclos reproductive, fêmea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cicli riproduttivi, femmina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναπαραγωγικοί κύκλοι, θηλυκό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciclos reproductivos, hembra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
